weka.server

Class WekaServer

  • java.lang.Object
    • weka.server.WekaServer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CommandlineRunnable

    public class WekaServer
extends java.lang.Object
implements CommandlineRunnable
    The main server program that launches tasks (either locally or on registered remote slaves).
    Version:
    $Revision: 13859 $
    Author:
    Mark Hall (mhall{[at]}pentaho{[dot]}com)

        hostname - hostname to run on

        executionSlots - the maximum number of tasks to execute in parallel
